object.name: sow_analysis
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:users="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/users" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="section_number" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Select sectioin number</description> <required>False</required> <title>Section Number</title> </field> <field name="details" type="zope.schema.Text"> <default>This was created via word and the parsing of the document......</default> <description>why is this here.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Details</title> </field> <field name="bodytext" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>The entire text of the section from thie Statement of Work</description> <required>False</required> <title>Full Scope Section Text</title> <validate_invariants>False</validate_invariants> </field> <field name="assigned" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>To whom is this section assigned for analysis.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Analysis Owner</title> <values> <element>Eric Clapton</element> <element>Ringo Star</element> </values> </field> <field name="priority" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>Rate the level of importance 1-3 . "1" is most critical</description> <required>False</required> <title>Priority</title> <values> <element>1</element> <element>2</element> <element>3</element> <element></element> </values> </field> <fieldset name="date" label="date" description="Who is the owner of this Scope section analysis"> <field name="analysis_due_date" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description>Initial estimate of the due date.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Initial Due Date</title> </field> <field name="revised_due_date" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description>If the initial due date has been changed.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Revised Due Date</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="notes" label="Notes" description="Enter any notes"> <field name="notes" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Notes from Project Manager regarding this section</description> <required>False</required> <title>Project Manager Notes</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="actions_items" label="Actions Items" description="These are the action items generated from the analysis of this Statement of Work."> <field name="explanation" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>What is this for</description> <required>False</required> <title>Explanation</title> </field> <field name="create_action_item" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>This will be button to create an action item</description> <required>False</required> <title>Create action item</title> </field> <field name="action_items_related_will_be_listed_here" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <default>There will be list of action items created based on analysis</default> <description>List of action items from the analysis</description> <required>False</required> <title>Action items related will be listed here</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="qc_requirements" label="QC Requirements" description="Is QC required for this section? If so, give details."> <field name="internal_qc_required_" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>Will the output of the action item require review by Parametrix internal QC?</description> <required>False</required> <title>Internal QC Required?</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="estimated_qc_time" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description>If QC is required, please provide estimate of how long. Contact the QC department if needed to get good estimate.</description> <required>False</required> <title>Estimated QC Time</title> <values> <element>1 hour</element> <element>3 hours</element> <element>5 hours</element> </values> </field> <field name="notes_to_qc" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Enter anything that might help the QC process</description> <required>False</required> <title>Notes to QC</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="analysis_notes" label="Analysis Notes" description="Person analyzing this Scope section add any notes regarding your analysis."> <field name="is_the_analyis_complete" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Is the analyis complete</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="analysis_notes" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Analysis Notes</title> </field> <field name="submit_for_review" type="zope.schema.Text"> <default>There will be a button to use workflow to submit</default> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Submit for review</title> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="close_out" label="Close Out" description="Actions taken to close this analysis"/> </schema> </model>
